title: Alternative font
content:
Hi everyone, does anyone know about a free font like Tj Evolette A?  
I'm specially looking for something like the alternates letters in this set.

[http://26plus-zeichen.de/fonts/tj-evolette-a/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014160102/http:/26plus-zeichen.de/fonts/tj-evolette-a/ "http://26plus-zeichen.de/fonts/tj-evolette-a/")
author: allefio

comments.content:
